title: A facile approach to fabricate a stabilized slippery lubricant-infused porous surface with dynamic omniphobicity for self-cleaning
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23621-23628
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03770G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yingfen Huang
A slippery lubricant-infused porous surface (SLIPS), which exhibited excellent dynamic omniphobicity, stability, self-cleaning, and self-repairing performances, was successfully fabricated utilizing biocompatible materials and a facile approach.
